        public java.lang.String employeeShiftChange(Shift shift)
        Used for shiftChange content in newsfeed for employees
        Parameters:
        shift - - ID of the available shift
        Returns:
        formatted string with shifttype (day/evening/night)

      • shiftChangeAdmin

        public java.lang.String shiftChangeAdmin(User userInvolving)
        Used for shiftChange notifications for administrators
        Parameters:
        userInvolving - - the employee that wants to change the shift
        Returns:
        formatted string with the name of the employee who wants to change his/her shift

      • validAbsence

        public java.lang.String validAbsence(User user)
        Used for valid absence notifications for administrators
        Parameters:
        user - - the user who has registered valid absence (illness)
        Returns:
        formatted string with the name of the employee who has registered valid absence

      • regTimebank

        public java.lang.String regTimebank(User user,
                                    int minutes)
        Used for the "timebank" notification for administrators
        Parameters:
        user - - employee who has registered overtime
        minutes - - #minutes the employee has worked
        Returns:
        formatted string with name of the employee who has worked overtime and amt of minutes

      • userResponsible

        public java.lang.String userResponsible(User user)
        Notification for the administrator that there has been selected a new employee as responsible for a shift
        Parameters:
        user - employee who is responsible
        Returns:
        formatted string with user name

      • acceptTimebank

        public java.lang.String acceptTimebank(int minutes)
        notification for overtime/absence
        Parameters:
        minutes - - the amount of minutes the employee has worked extra/been absent
        Returns:
        if negative minutes, returns string formatted for absence if postive minutes, returns string formatted for overtime
